item.content:
I am not that great at maintaining blogs, but I will try to do a better job with this attempt. I’m Predrag and welcome to my new blog. I will focus here mostly on cloud and security topics I get to deal on a daily basis, whether it is my research, fun or some work related stuff (of course without violating any NDA’s or confidentiality). On daily basis I work with Microsoft Cloud technologies as well as design, integrate and operate various security solutions. Most of my time I spend debugging or writing code to automate most of my work and further improving my skills.

I have spent a good decade of my life in Middle East (Qatar, Turkey, Saudi, UAE) and Asia (Malaysia, Singapore, and Hong Kong) and now I am back in Europe (Vienna) where I work and live. All the views and statements in this blog are my own, and represent only my view or opinion on various matters.

I have some sort of passion, that is being nerdy and geeky when it comes to technology. I am obsessed with the bleeding cutting edge technology and I always play around with it. Here I will try to document various experiments I’ve done and maybe, one day it will be useful for someone.
